Name: Waldo
description:
Waldo, age 28, is in a common law relationship. He has dedicated part of his life to working in search of a better living conditions. This young person has decided to help with household responsibilities, and so he started a business growing coffee in the municipality of Anz√°, seeing a lack of job opportunities.

Waldo needs to provide daily support for his household. With his bravery and effort he has managed to get his family ahead. His great dream is to be able to make his business grow and to increase his income. Therefore he is requesting a loan because he lacks his own capital. He will use the funds to buy various sacks of mulch, as well as fertilizers to care for his crops.
